# isSupported

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether this device supports the camera frame provider.

## Declaration

```swift
static var isSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Instance properties

- **requiredAuthorizations**: The authorization types you need to use the camera frame provider.

items.description: The authorization types you need to use the camera frame provider.
